Articles.Content:
I am not a rocket scientist, but my other ship is the Normandy SR2.

I've been playing around with the beta(maybe alpha?) since before there were strut connectors... if that's any frame of reference.

I've learned how to get myself in orbit and home... usually. My next stop is mun! If I can... I know there's a tutorial for it. But I'm trying to learn how to build my own moon capable rocket first.

Soooo many more parts since .13 to play with. Is there a primer of sorts on them?
